reviews.text:
I've always referred to this place as "the takeout counter inside the Arirang Market". I only learned it has its own name earlier this year... oops.

So...
It's a cold day, so Korean food seemed a perfect fit. Actually, I'll take Korean food any day. All the wonderful flavors, all the banchan. Just love it....

Unexpectedly wonderful food in the back of Arirang Korean grocery! 

You order and pay at the front cash register than bring your ticket to the kitchen and...
